content.question: During optimal conditions, the rate of change of the population of a certain organism is proportional to the population at time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, in hours. At time <math alttext="t equals 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> hours, the population is 300. At time <math alttext="t equals 24" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>24</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> hours, the population is 1000. At what time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is the population 500 ?

choices.label: <math alttext="t equals, the fraction with numerator 24, times the square root of 2, and denominator the square root of 7" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>24</mn><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="t equals, the fraction 48 over 7" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>48</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>7</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="t equals, the fraction with numerator 24 times the natural log of 500, and denominator the natural log of 1000" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>24</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>500</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>1000</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="t equals, the fraction with numerator the natural log of five thirds, and denominator the fraction 1 over 24, end fraction, times the natural log of ten thirds, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>24</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="t equals, the fraction with numerator the natural log of five thirds, and denominator the fraction 1 over 24, end fraction, times the natural log of ten thirds, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>24</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.G: Confirm that solutions are accurate and appropriate.
